docs.lead_paragraph: “The Whole Truth,” a show at the Jewish Museum in Berlin, includes a Jewish person sitting in a glass box for two hours every day except Saturday.
docs.abstract: Exhibit The Whole Truth at the Jewish Museum in Berlin, intended to demystify Jewish life for curious but largely uninformed German public, includes Jewish person sitting in a glass box for two hours every day and answering questions.

docs.snippet: Improving its ability to find treasure amid junk offers Facebook a chance to topple Google from the throne as the king of search....
docs.lead_paragraph: Improving its ability to find treasure amid junk offers Facebook a chance to topple Google from the throne as the king of search.
docs.abstract: Analysts say Facebook, which has had stock rally over increased advertising efforts, needs to improve its search ability to challenge Google; it has expanded its search engineer staff and rolled out new features to help users discover information on site.

headline.seo: Fortunes of Facebook May Hinge on Searches

docs.lead_paragraph: While Facebook has not promoted the storefronts that have popped up on its site, they provide a way for small businesses to sell and to communicate with consumers.
docs.abstract: Small businesses are finding success on Facebook, in a growing trend of online commerce being called F-commerce; Facebook storefronts provide a way for direct communication and sales to consumers.
